title: Nine Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf-affiliated MPs demand recusal of chief justice in election tribunals case
content: Nine PTI candidates demanded the recusal of CJP Qazi Faez Isa from hearing the case on Election Tribunals in Punjab. They claimed their lawyers faced difficulties in filing the application. The Supreme Court had suspended an earlier High Court judgement regarding tribunal formations. The case hearing is scheduled for August 19 with requests for adjournment due to lawyer availability issues.
summary: Nine PTI candidates demanded the recusal of CJP Qazi Faez Isa from hearing the case on Election Tribunals in Punjab. They claimed their lawyers faced difficulties in filing the application. The Supreme Court had suspended an earlier High Court judgement regarding tribunal formations. The case hearing is scheduled for August 19 with requests for adjournment due to lawyer availability issues.

title: Russia opens criminal probe into Italian journalists who entered Kursk
Germany to cut Ukraine military aid in 2025
South Korea, Japan, US leaders renew pledge to cooperate on regional challenges
content: The leaders of South Korea, Japan, and the United States reaffirmed their commitment to address regional challenges in a joint statement on the anniversary of their Camp David summit. They emphasized continued military and economic cooperation to counter threats from China and North Korea.
summary: The leaders of South Korea, Japan, and the United States reaffirmed their commitment to address regional challenges in a joint statement on the anniversary of their Camp David summit. They emphasized continued military and economic cooperation to counter threats from China and North Korea.

title: Yunus to brief foreign diplomats in Dhaka today
Israeli airstrike kills 15 in Gaza; mediators hope for a ceasefire
Strengthening positions in western Russia, says Ukraine
‘We are not alone’: Ex-defense official claims in new UFO memoir
content: Former senior defense official Luis Elizondo, in his memoir 'Imminent: Inside the Pentagon's Hunt for UFOs,' revealed that glowing green orbs invaded his home, affecting his personal life. These events, witnessed by his family and neighbors, highlighted ongoing government knowledge of UFOs since the 1940s. Elizondo emphasized the need for public awareness and official disclosure on these phenomena.
summary: Former senior defense official Luis Elizondo, in his memoir 'Imminent: Inside the Pentagon's Hunt for UFOs,' revealed that glowing green orbs invaded his home, affecting his personal life. These events, witnessed by his family and neighbors, highlighted ongoing government knowledge of UFOs since the 1940s. Elizondo emphasized the need for public awareness and official disclosure on these phenomena.

title: No joke: The onion thinks print is the future of media
Chemistry classes, research labs build China’s tech prowess
Shark Tank judge Mark Cuban backs Democrat Harris' economic plan
content: Kamala Harris' economic policies, including tax cuts and real estate support, were praised by Mark Cuban. Highlighting her focus on reducing high costs, Cuban backed her proposal to ban price gouging. Harris also announced her plans for transparency in pharmacy pricing and tackling healthcare middlemen, aiming to foster competition and innovation within the industry.
summary: Kamala Harris' economic policies, including tax cuts and real estate support, were praised by Mark Cuban. Highlighting her focus on reducing high costs, Cuban backed her proposal to ban price gouging. Harris also announced her plans for transparency in pharmacy pricing and tackling healthcare middlemen, aiming to foster competition and innovation within the industry.

title: Trump labels Harris as 'radical left lunatic' in Pennsylvania rally; says 'Biden hates Kamala'
content: Former President Donald Trump criticized Vice President Kamala Harris and President Joe Biden during a rally in Pennsylvania, focusing on their economic policies. Trump claimed that Harris's background and policies have worsened the economy, citing inflation and lower real incomes. He also warned of an economic depression if he does not win the upcoming election.
summary: Former President Donald Trump criticized Vice President Kamala Harris and President Joe Biden during a rally in Pennsylvania, focusing on their economic policies. Trump claimed that Harris's background and policies have worsened the economy, citing inflation and lower real incomes. He also warned of an economic depression if he does not win the upcoming election.

title: Son of Creedence Clearwater Revival drummer charged with girlfriend’s murder, linked to second killing
content: Brent Clifford, son of Creedence Clearwater Revival drummer Doug Clifford, was charged with the murder of his girlfriend, Patricia Portella-Wright, after her remains were found near a Nevada highway. Clifford, 55, was also named a person of interest in the killing of William Andrews, found dead with a gunshot wound. Clifford is being held without bail.
summary: Brent Clifford, son of Creedence Clearwater Revival drummer Doug Clifford, was charged with the murder of his girlfriend, Patricia Portella-Wright, after her remains were found near a Nevada highway. Clifford, 55, was also named a person of interest in the killing of William Andrews, found dead with a gunshot wound. Clifford is being held without bail.

title: Israeli strike in south Lebanon kills 10, injures 5
Earthquake of magnitude 7.2 hits Russia's Kamchatka
content: A 7.0 magnitude earthquake struck off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula, leading to the eruption of the Shiveluch volcano. Ash rose up to 8 kilometres above sea level, accompanied by lava flow. No injuries have been reported. The region, home to many active volcanoes, felt tremors and saw an aftershock, but there was no major damage.
summary: A 7.0 magnitude earthquake struck off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula, leading to the eruption of the Shiveluch volcano. Ash rose up to 8 kilometres above sea level, accompanied by lava flow. No injuries have been reported. The region, home to many active volcanoes, felt tremors and saw an aftershock, but there was no major damage.

title: Kamala Harris campaign reserves $370 million in ads after labour day, targets battleground states
content: Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign had reserved $370 million for advertising from Labor Day to Election Day in crucial battleground states. The campaign planned to spend $170 million on television ads and over $200 million on digital platforms. In contrast, Donald Trump's campaign reserved ads in only Pennsylvania and Georgia.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign had reserved $370 million for advertising from Labor Day to Election Day in crucial battleground states. The campaign planned to spend $170 million on television ads and over $200 million on digital platforms. In contrast, Donald Trump's campaign reserved ads in only Pennsylvania and Georgia.

title: Once a democrat voting for Hillary, now ... ': What J D Vance said about wife Usha
content: Usha Vance, wife of Ohio Senator JD Vance, shifted from supporting Hillary Clinton to embracing the MAGA agenda. Her transformation has drawn interest due to her Democratic roots and elite educational background. Usha's support and contributions have been significant in JD's political journey, highlighting her behind-the-scenes influence.
summary: Usha Vance, wife of Ohio Senator JD Vance, shifted from supporting Hillary Clinton to embracing the MAGA agenda. Her transformation has drawn interest due to her Democratic roots and elite educational background. Usha's support and contributions have been significant in JD's political journey, highlighting her behind-the-scenes influence.

title: 'He definitely was a hero': Wife of Donald Trump rally hero Corey Comperatore speaks out for the first time
content: During a rally for Donald Trump in Butler Township, Corey Comperatore died while protecting his family from gunfire. His widow and daughters recounted his courageous act, describing him as a hero. The family received vast support and plans to start a foundation in his name. Legal action is being pursued for security lapses at the event.
summary: During a rally for Donald Trump in Butler Township, Corey Comperatore died while protecting his family from gunfire. His widow and daughters recounted his courageous act, describing him as a hero. The family received vast support and plans to start a foundation in his name. Legal action is being pursued for security lapses at the event.

title: Watch: Trump video criticises Kamala Harris as 'weak,' 'failed,' 'dangerously liberal'
content: Former President Donald Trump released a video on X (formerly Twitter) targeting Kamala Harris. The video contained clips of Harris discussing policy positions, including eliminating filibusters, banning fracking, supporting gun confiscation, and advocating for socialist health care. The video aimed to portray her as weak, failed, and dangerously liberal, raising concerns over her potential presidency.
summary: Former President Donald Trump released a video on X (formerly Twitter) targeting Kamala Harris. The video contained clips of Harris discussing policy positions, including eliminating filibusters, banning fracking, supporting gun confiscation, and advocating for socialist health care. The video aimed to portray her as weak, failed, and dangerously liberal, raising concerns over her potential presidency.

title: Pakistan formulates strategy to tackle mpox, allays fears of outbreak
content: The Pakistan government formulated a policy to address the mpox virus after only one case was reported. Surveillance and screening procedures were instated at entry points, with laboratories allocated for diagnosis. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif ordered strict vigilance and an awareness campaign. Public isolation and prompt doctor consultation were advised for symptomatic individuals.
summary: The Pakistan government formulated a policy to address the mpox virus after only one case was reported. Surveillance and screening procedures were instated at entry points, with laboratories allocated for diagnosis. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif ordered strict vigilance and an awareness campaign. Public isolation and prompt doctor consultation were advised for symptomatic individuals.
